title: It Suits You!
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>I’m sorry that you have to tag along with me, Chika-san. I’ll pick a pair of new glasses right away<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eeh, it’ll be a waste if you decide that quickly. Since there are these many, you might as well try various ones<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Fufu, thank you. Hmm…. How about this one?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>It fits, it fits! It’s cute! Ah, try this one too<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>This is the one you picked, Chika-san…. How does it look?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Aah-! It’s good! I think it’s great!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Hey, why don’t you try some too, Chika-san? Look, I think something like this will suit you….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>The only times I’ve worn glasses are when You-chan let me play with hers…. How is it? Do I look funny? Does it suit me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Eeeh-! Glasses really suit you, Chika-san! Ah, try this one too. Then this one and this one! Uwaah-! So cute!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Really-!? Ehehe, it does make me look smarter, maybe I’ll buy one then~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
